text:
[Verse]
Feel the raindrops on your skin
Dance with me let joy begin
Sky is crying don't feel blue
Rainy days can be fun too

[Verse 2]
Splash in puddles see the light
Evening turns into the night
Umbrellas up let's take a spin
Laughing loud through thick and thin

[Chorus]
Dance dance in the rain
Lose the sorrow lose the pain
Feel the rhythm feel the beat
Moving with the rain so sweet

[Verse 3]
Hear the thunder roll so wild
Lightning flashes makes us smile
Nature's show put on display
Come with me let's fly away

[Bridge]
Hold me close don't let me go
Feel the raindrops start to flow
Heartbeats mix with stormy skies
Love's a spark in rainy eyes

[Chorus]
Dance dance in the rain
Lose the sorrow lose the pain
Feel the rhythm feel the beat
Moving with the rain so sweet
title: Dance of the Rain
